name: Social Referrals
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Logs and displays social site referrals

License

Copyright 2010 – 2014 Joe Boydston, Don Kukral

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of

GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software
Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USANo shortcodes yet .. but it does keep track of the number of referrals in the last 24 hours.

Two WP options are set with these values and updated whenever a new referrer is logged.

social_referrals_facebook_count
social_referrals_twitter_count
sections.installation:
Copy “social-referrals” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.4

Verified compat with WP 3.9.1

1.3

Added wordpress.com tracker

1.2

Fixed hardcoded table name

1.1

Added setting to custom how many hours back to display of the count.

1.0

Initial version

short_description: Plugin for WordPress logs social site referrals and provides shortcodes for displaying them.
